alert.note: Alert for Adair; Cherokee; Delaware; Mayes (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 5:58PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Benton, northeastern Washington, Delaware, eastern Mayes, northwestern Adair and northeastern Cherokee Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 557 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 3 miles southeast of Maysville, moving east at 15 mph. Several other strong thunderstorms were located over eastern Mayes and western Delaware Counties. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Siloam Springs... Jay... Bella Vista... Lowell... Pea Ridge... Gentry... Tontitown... Gravette... Cave Springs... Decatur... Salina... West Siloam Springs... Langley... Colcord... Kansas... Highfill... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 69 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
